description: This file defines data models and enums for filter criteria used in a preferences or filtering feature, including classes for representing ranges and user preferences with attributes such as height, weight, race, and hair color.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: Represents an inclusive numeric range with optional minimum and maximum values.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: Immutable class encapsulating user filter preferences, including ranges and optional attributes for race and hair color.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the object with specified fields modified.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a string representation of the object.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code for the object.
